attributes.action: listen to facebook users and remove the smoking ban in pubs and clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have started a facebook group to see how many real people (not lords or ministers) actually want the smoking ban lifted over the next 12 months i am going to run a group to find out.. i am a non smoker but can see by all the borded up pubs popping up every day that a great mistake has been made and this its self is damaging the econemy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
